amendatorysection.para: The general purpose of the Nebraska Potato Council is to coordinate the interests and objectives of all segments of the Nebraska potato industry. It shall be the official organization representing potato growers, shippers, processors, and dealers in specialized supplies within the state. The council shall foster improvements in the production and marketing of seed and table stock and the processing of potatoes, and shall sponsor the annual Nebraska Potato Show.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Potato Development Act, see section 2-1801.
